summary: THERE IS AN INTERNAL SHORT IN THE TAIL LIGHT HOUSINGS THAT RESULTS IN NO BRAKE LIGHTS WHEN PARKING LIGHTS OR HEADLIGHTS ARE ON. DEALER TOLD ME THAT THIS IS AN OCCASIONAL PROBLEM IN THIS MODEL BUT THAT SATURN DOES NOT VIEW THIS AS A DEFECT AND IT IS OWNERS RESPONSIBILITY. THIS IS A POTENTIAL  SAFETY HAZARD. A NEIGHBOR OWNS THE SAME MODEL CAR AND HAS THE SAME PROBLEM.   *JB
